steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I save `content` attribute value of element located `elementName(version):a` to ((story)) variable `ui-version`
When I go to relative URL `/my-cases?search=all`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-create-new-case-button)` appears
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-create-new-case-button)`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(Select Case Type)` appears
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case`
When I go to relative URL `/new-case`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-new-case-card-button)->filter.index(2)`
When I wait until element located by `linkText(select file)` appears
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case/upload-video`
When I change context to element located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='upload']/..)`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-upload-video-form`
When I reset context

scenarios.title: failed video upload

steps: When I select element located `testId(upload)` and upload file `/files/<file-name>`
When I save `aria-valuenow` attribute value of element located `xpath(//*[@role='progressbar'])` to scenario variable `upload-progress`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(Failed to upload)` appears
When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-file-progress)`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-button-file-cancel-and-remove-option)`

steps.value: When I select element located `testId(upload)` and upload file `/files/((FORCE_ERROR.mp4))`
When I save `aria-valuenow` attribute value of element located `xpath(//*[@role='progressbar'])` to ((scenario)) variable `upload-progress`
Then `${upload-progress}` is ((<=)) `100`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(Failed to upload)` appears
When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-file-progress)`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-upload-video-result-#{substringBefore(((FORCE_ERROR.mp4)), .)}`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-button-file-cancel-and-remove-option)`
When I reset context

steps.value: When I select element located `testId(upload)` and upload file `/files/((mov_video.mov))`
When I save `aria-valuenow` attribute value of element located `xpath(//*[@role='progressbar'])` to ((scenario)) variable `upload-progress`
Then `${upload-progress}` is ((<=)) `100`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(Failed to upload)` appears
When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-file-progress)`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-upload-video-result-#{substringBefore(((mov_video.mov)), .)}`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-button-file-cancel-and-remove-option)`
When I reset context

scenarios.title: check cancel pop-up using close buttons and continue case editing

steps: When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-button)`
When I click on element located by `testId(<button-id>)`

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-button)`
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-close-icon-confirm-dialog)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case/upload-video`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-button)`
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-button-confirm-confirm-dialog)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case/upload-video`

scenarios.title: check cancel pop-up using cancel button and leave case editing

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-cancel-button)`
When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-confirm-dialog)`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-cancel-upload-video-pop-up`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-button-reject-confirm-dialog)`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case`
